attributes.action: stop british industry/companies being purchased by foreign state owned companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British companies are being purchased by foreign governments which may have their own countries interests before UK interests. An example is the state owned Quatari Investment Authorities purchase of a stake in the London Stock Exchange. Is it in Britains interests to have a foreign government in control of such a major part of our economy?
